metadata.name: TRIBE U #1
metadata.description:
A rare TRIBE digital collection, this token grants exclusive access to NYCE's wealth academy TRIBE U, including hands-on training and 1:1 mentorship.  
Token holders become verified members of the NYCE community, which includes:  
- Honorary TRIBE board seat  
- Ownership rights to TRIBE's metaverse logo  
- Vote on future TRIBE initiatives  
- 12-month TRIBE+ tuition ($479 value)  
- Verified status  
As the community grows, so may the NFT's potential resale value.
